default.shortDescription: Integrates custom file types into Microsoft 365
descriptionParagraphs: File Handlers are a type of Microsoft 365 add-in that integrates custom file types into the service allowing you to provide rich experiences for any proprietary format.

items.name: Markdown File Handler V2
items.description: File handler for Office 365 to enable previewing and viewing markdown documents

items.name: Markdown FileHandler
items.description: This file handler sample uses Nextjs, MSAL, the Monaco editor, and React to demonstrate a Markdown file handler.

detailItemCategories.name: Documentation
detailItemCategories.description: Get started building OneDrive file handlers

items.name: Adding custom preview, open, and actions to files with File Handlers 2.0
items.description: With File Handlers, you can enable the following user experiences in OneDrive for Business and SharePoint document libraries.

items.name: Specifying actions for file handlers 2.0
items.description: When registering a file handler, you specify a set of actions enabled by the file handler.

items.name: How to: Register a file handler add-in manually
items.description: To develop a file handler add-in you first need to upload your file handler manifest into your app registration in Azure Active Directory.

items.name: Localizing file handler strings
items.description: To ensure that your file handler add-in meets international requirements, you must localize the display strings used in your file handler.
